definition: the birthplace (of sth good)/the cradle (e.g. of art)
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: Yantai is also the birthplace of China's modern timepiece making industry.
sentences.chinese: 煙臺又是中國現代制鐘業的發祥地。

sentences.english: Furthermore, Ksitigarbha Bodhisattva Temple is one of the important birthplaces of Sha-Ci culture.
sentences.chinese: 另外，地藏寺還是沙磁文化的重要發祥地之一。

sentences.english: Yunmen Temple is the birthplace of Yunmen Sect, one of the five Chan Sects.
sentences.chinese: 雲門寺則是禪宗五大派之一的雲門宗的發祥地。

sentences.english: China is the birthplace of world's culture in remote antiquity.
sentences.chinese: 中國是世界遠古文化的發祥地。

sentences.english: Thus, the cloud of light holes is the birthplace of Taoism Quanzhen Kunshan school.
sentences.chinese: 因此說，雲光洞是道教全真教崑山派的發祥地。

sentences.english: Asia is the birthplace of the great religions of the world.
sentences.chinese: 亞洲是世界各大宗教的發祥地。

sentences.english: Tianjin is one of the educational birthplaces in modern history in China.
sentences.chinese: 天津是我國近代教育的發祥地之一。

sentences.english: Heishan county is the cradle of Errenzhuan, which has more than two hundred years of history.
sentences.chinese: 黑山縣是二人轉的發祥地，有着二百多年的歷史。

sentences.english: Hangzhou boasts a 5,000-year history of civilization, and her Liangzhu Civilization was one of the cradles of Chinese Civilization.
sentences.chinese: 多年的文明史，良渚文化是中華文明的發祥地之一。

sentences.english: Shandong is the birthplace of many famous ancient scholars such as Confucious and Mencius.
sentences.chinese: 山東是發祥地，許多古代著名的學者，如孔子和孟子。

sentences.english: The Anhui Province Jixi County is the emblem vegetable birthplace, the element reputation "township of the emblem kitchen".
sentences.chinese: 安徽省績溪縣是徽菜的發祥地，素譽“徽廚之鄉”。

sentences.english: The thou of Xian calls Chang-an, is one of the place of origin that human civilization with Chinese nation.
sentences.chinese: 西安古稱長安，是人類文明和中華民族的發祥地之一。

sentences.english: Cha Shan is the birthplace of Taoism.
sentences.chinese: 槎山是道教的重要發祥地。

sentences.english: This is the birthplace of Chinese ancient civilization.
sentences.chinese: 這裏是我國古代文明的發祥地。

sentences.english: Egypt is the cradle of civilization.
Liuzhou is the birthplace of ancestors in South China.
sentences.chinese: 柳州是中國南方人類的發祥地。
